name: Thunder
effect: Inflicts Wounds. Roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze foe. If performed under Rain or Thunderstorm Weather, Ignore this move's Reduced Accuracy and gain Never Fail. If performed under Sunny Weather, Accuracy becomes -3 instead. -2 Accuracy.
description: The Pokemon commands a tremendous lightning to strike a specific point on the ground. It's quite dangerous.
